events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me well, I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sophie M. who specializes in refund and return requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'll assist you with this process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has any damages or has been used? This will help us process your refund efficiently.
My order number is #987654. The jacket is brand new and has no damages. I just realized it doesn't fit, so I'd like to return it.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and once we receive the item in good condition, we will issue a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
I have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
We wanted to follow up and check if you have shipped the jacket back and if you have any further questions regarding your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and I am looking forward to receiving my refund soon. Thanks for your help!
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent a short survey to your email to gather feedback on your satisfaction with our refund process.
